meanings.definition: Fluorenes: a class of organic compounds containing a fluorene core structure.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different fluorenes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use fluorenes in various experiments.
meanings.sent3: The fluorenes at the party were the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity shone like fluorenes in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of fluorenes under the microscope amazed the students.
